creator: ronnyhel@hotmail.com
text:
I use tomcat 5.5.4 with struts framework,the jsp cant show img with more than 
(n)kb size . If i try a direct  access with:
http://localhost:8080/myspace/imgDir/moreThanN_kb.gif  i recive this error:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 
org.apache.naming.resources.ResourceAttributes.getCanonicalPath()
Ljava/lang/String


http://localhost:8080/myspace/imgDir/lessThanN_kb.gif i see the picture in my 
browser

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
You most likely have a messed up installation of Tomcat, Struts, your upload
library, or some combination thereof, or simply a bug in your JSP.  I've tested
Tomcat image uploads a bit, up to a few MB per image, maybe yours are bigger,
and it seems to work fine (using jakarta commons-fileupload).  If you have a
test web app or another way for us to reproduce your error, please post it.  If
you have determined a specific value for N, please post that as well.

Hi,
I've the same problem :
https://test-demat.telmedia.net/modula_telmedia/include/mt.js can be show (it's 
just a little script)
https://test-demat.telmedia.net/modula_telmedia/include/prototype.js is bigger 
and can't be shown
creator: willy.villard@matamore.com

text:
I solved the problem:
I have installed tomcat-5.5.17 and tomcat-admin-5.5.20.When I trid to 
uninstall all and reinstall tomcat-5.5.17 only ,the problem solved.
creator: shaoyuqing@qihuikang.com
